name: flat
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: level and smooth, with no curved, high, or hollow parts

example.eg: An ice rink needs to be completely flat.
example.egtrans: 溜冰场地必须十分平坦。

example.eg: Roll out the pastry on a flat surface.
example.egtrans: 在平的面板上把油酥面团擀薄。

example.eg: Much of the countryside in that region is very flat.
example.egtrans: 那一地区的许多乡村都地势平坦。

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: level but having little or no height

example.eg: flat shoes (= ones without a raised heel)
example.egtrans: 平底鞋

trans_examp.trans_en: Flat bread is made without yeast, and therefore does not rise.

example.eg: Pitta and nan are two types of flat bread.
example.egtrans: 皮塔饼和印度薄饼是两种未发酵的面包。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: a hat that is not rounded on top and has little height

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: not interesting, or without emotion or excitement
trans_examp.trans_cn: 不积极的；不感兴趣的；缺乏热情的

example.eg: After the excitement of the party, life seems somewhat flat now.
example.egtrans: 聚会的兴奋劲儿过去之后，生活现在似乎相当乏味。

example.eg: I thought her performance a little flat.
example.egtrans: 我觉得她的表演有点平淡。

example.eg: I think the colours in this painting are kind of flat (= not varied or bright).
example.egtrans: 我认为这幅油画的色彩有些平淡。

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: with no electrical power left in it

example.eg: I left my car lights on and now the battery is flat.
example.egtrans: 我的车灯没关，现在电池没电了。

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: If a drink is flat, it has stopped being fizzy (= with bubbles).

example.eg: If you don't put the top back on that bottle of beer, it will go flat.
example.egtrans: 你要是不把那瓶啤酒的瓶盖盖上，它会走气的。

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: complete or certain, and not likely to change

example.eg: His request for time off work was met with a flat refusal.
example.egtrans: 他的休假要求遭到了断然拒绝。

example.eg: The official has issued a flat denial of the accusations against her.
example.egtrans: 那位官员矢口否认对她的那些指控。

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: If something such as a tyre or ball is flat, it does not contain enough air.

example.eg: I got a flat tyre (= the air went out of it) after driving over a nail.
example.egtrans: 我的车胎扎了钉子后瘪了。

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: (especially of an amount of money) fixed and not likely to change

example.eg: We charge a flat fee/rate of $25 per hour.
example.egtrans: 我们每小时统一收费25美元。

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: If profits, sales, etc. are flat, they are not growing or increasing.

example.eg: Demand for our machinery abroad is increasing, while growth is flat at home.
example.egtrans: 在海外对我们生产的机器需求在不断增长，在国内却十分平缓。

name: flat
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a set of rooms for living in that are part of a larger building and are usually all on one floor

example.eg: a furnished/unfurnished flat
example.egtrans: 配家具／未配家具的公寓

example.eg: a block of flats
example.egtrans: 一栋公寓楼

example.eg: They have a house in the country and a flat in Manchester.
example.egtrans: 他们在乡下有一套房子，在曼切斯特有一套公寓。

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an area of low, level ground, often near water

example.eg: The salt flats are used for motor racing.
example.egtrans: 盐滩被用作摩托车比赛场地。

example.eg: The mud flats attract large numbers of birds.
example.egtrans: 潮泥滩吸引了大批鸟类。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: the palm and fingers when they are held straight and level

example.eg: He hit me with the flat of his hand.
example.egtrans: 他打了我一巴掌。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to be on a level surface, not on a slope or hill

example.eg: Most of the path is on the flat.
example.egtrans: 这条小径大部分都在平地上。

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a tyre that does not have any or enough air in it

example.eg: We were late because we had to stop and fix a flat.
example.egtrans: 我们迟到了，因为中途不得不停下来修理漏气的轮胎。

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: I feel more comfortable in flats.
example.egtrans: 我穿平底鞋感觉更舒适。

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: (a symbol for) a note that is a semitone lower than a stated note

name: flat
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: (in music) lower than a particular note or the correct note
trans_examp.trans_cn: （音乐）低于标准音高的，偏低的

example.eg: The top string on your violin is flat.
example.egtrans: 你的小提琴 E 弦音偏低。

example.eg: She sang flat throughout the song (= all the notes she sang were too low).
example.egtrans: 她把整首歌的音调都唱低了。

name: flat
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: in a level position, often against another surface
trans_examp.trans_cn: （常指贴着另一表面）水平地，平直地

example.eg: Lay the cloth flat across the table.
example.egtrans: 把布平铺在桌子上。

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: into a flat shape without height

example.eg: These patio chairs will fold flat for storage.
example.egtrans: 这些花园坐椅可以折叠起来存放。

dsense.name: flat
dsense.posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: completely or to the greatest degree possible

example.eg: She told him flat that she would not go to the show.
example.egtrans: 她直截了当地告诉他她是不会去看表演的。

example.eg: Could you lend me some money, I'm flat broke (= I have no money).
example.egtrans: 你能借我些钱吗？我一个子儿也没有了。

phrase.phrase_title: three minutes, half an hour, etc. flat

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: exactly three minutes, half an hour, etc.

example.eg: We managed to get to the station in five minutes flat.
example.egtrans: 我们设法正好用了5分钟时间赶到了车站。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: as fast or as hard as possible

example.eg: My car only does about 60 mph, even when it's going flat out.
example.egtrans: 我的车即使全速行驶，也只能跑到每小时60英里左右。

example.eg: We've been working flat out to get this done.
example.egtrans: 为了完成这项工作，我们一直在全力以赴。
